price: 61. Kuwaasaa u degdega khayraadka, una dheereeya.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
